Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Exe Area Central, you'll be centrally located in Santiago de Compostela, convenient to Santo Domingo de Bonaval Park and Santiago de Compostela Cathedral. This hotel is within close proximity of Multiusos Fontes do Sar and San Lazaro Stadium.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 59 air-conditioned guestrooms. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Dining
Take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours).

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-in, express check-out, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is Noon
Take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours).
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.


Make yourself at home in one of the 59 air-conditioned guestrooms. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

With a stay at Exe Area Central, you'll be centrally located in Santiago de Compostela, convenient to Santo Domingo de Bonaval Park and Santiago de Compostela Cathedral. This hotel is within close proximity of Multiusos Fontes do Sar and San Lazaro Stadium.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Santo Domingo de Bonaval Park - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Multiusos Fontes do Sar - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
San Lazaro Stadium - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Museum of the Galician People - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Galician Center of Contemporary Art - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Belvis Park - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Congress and Exposition Center of Galicia - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Mercado de Abastos de Santiago - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
City of Culture of Galicia - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Museum of Pilgrimages of Santiago - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Sacred Art Museum - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Monastery and Church of San Paio de Antealtares - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Plaza de la Quintana - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Puerta Santa - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
San Martino Pinario Monastery - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi

The preferred airport for Exe Area Central is Santiago de Compostela (SCQ-Lavacolla) - 8.8 km / 5.5 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Area Central is Santiago de Compostela (SCQ-Lavacolla) - 8.8 km / 5.5 mi.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometre.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
